experiences.title: Eat like a local on a food tour
experiences.description: Learn about the history of food in Modern Singapore, from it’s founding in 1819 by Sir Stamford Raffles through to the present day. You will enjoy 10+ foodie tastings in 5.5 hours across 4 districts of Singapore.
experiences.requirements: All participants must be at least 7 years old.

experiences.title: Explore the Southern Islands on SUP
experiences.description: Explore the Southern Islands of Singapore with Gracie on a stand-up paddleboard!
experiences.requirements: All participants must be at least 16 years old.

experiences.title: Universal Studios Singapore
experiences.description: Singapore’s only movie-theme park features 24 rides and attractions, including a pair of dueling coasters that brush past one another in several near misses in their aerial combat. Thrill-seekers can choose between a coaster where they are seated or the other where riders are suspended. Exciting loops, sudden turns, breathtaking drops and thrilling near-collisions will make you scream your heart out.

experiences.title: ArtScience Museum
experiences.description: The ArtScience Museum at Marina Bay Sands is Singapore’s premier destination for major international touring exhibitions.Get transported back to the Precambrian, Triassic, Jurassic and Cretaceous prehistoric periods in the first exhibition of its kind, and relive the dinosaurs' natural environment as you uncover how the different species lived on earth.
